definition[0]: food – used especially when talking about the business of producing or selling food
definition[1]: a substance regularly used as food, especially one that is produced and sold as a product
example[1]: a sharp rise in the price of foodstuffs
example[2]: Most of the imports consist of essential foodstuffs (=extremely important food, such as grain, bread or rice).
example[3]: shortages ofbasic foodstuffs and consumer goods
example[4]: one of Japan’s staple foodstuffs, the soya bean
